messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: It is a capital crime to be a lizard and to have pink hair.

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: If I hear any more racisssim on the commsss I'll sssneak lizard mutagen into the air

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: RD be turnin usss into liggersss, LYNCH EM BOYSSS!!!

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Forgetsss-The-Rulesss, the RD, hasss been demoted for Force-Racing people to Lizard People. Good Riddance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard HONKBASE IN SPACE 142. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!
